name: Eves Drop (8points)
description:
Alpha for the upcoming release of Eves Drop

New Year's Eve 1999: Take control of the E.V.E. program as you free-fall through cyberspace to take down Big Brother's worldwide surveillance scheme. 

Hack data nodes to unlock power-ups or gain access to the next level.

Cyber-security kills reward you with health...if they don't kill you first.

Can you make it to the end before midnight?
